original_text: Jesus watched how people chose the best places to sit at the meal. So he told this story to those who were sitting there:
korean_text: 청함을 받은 사람들이 높은 자리 택함을 보시고 그들에게 비유로 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: Jesus watched how people chose the best places
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 사람들이 어떻게 최고의 자리를 선택하는지 보셨다

sentences.original_text: to those who were sitting there
